SOFT TO THE TOUCH.

It’s a given; your beard should be clean and well-groomed. But above all else, it should be soft.

For best use

Daily/Weekly AM or PM. After cleansing with BEVEL 2-in-1 Beard & Face Wash, massage into warm, wet beard hairs. Detangle before rinsing off. For deep conditioning, let this softener set in for 10-15 minutes while you shower. To use as a leave-in conditioner, massage a small amount into clean, wet beard hairs. Follow up with BEVEL 2-in-1 Pomade and Beard Oil for maximum moisture.

KEY INGREDIENTS

  • Aloe Vera - An antimicrobial and anti-inflammatory and helps calm the itch beneath the beard. Packed with Vitamins A, C and E, Aloe Vera helps promote great growth and sheen.
  • Coconut Oil - A natural oil that helps prevent the loss of protein and vital moisture from your hair.
  • Sweet Almond Oil - A lightweight, vitamin-rich oil that helps moisturize and strengthen your hair.
  • Shea Butter - Helps stop dryness by locking in moisture and provides shine without being greasy. It absorbs quickly into the skin and won’t clog your pores.

MADE WITHOUT

Sulfates, Alcohol, Silicones, Parabens, Phthalates, Artificial Dyes.

Full Ingredients

Water, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Glycerin, Cetearyl Alcohol, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (Sweet Almond) Oil, Oryza Sativa (Rice) Extract, Behentrimonium Chloride, Stearalkonium Chloride, Cetrimonium Chloride, Dipropylene Glycol, Glyceryl Stearate SE, Stearic Acid, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Potassium Sorbate, Phenoxyethanol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Tocopherol, Menthol, Citric Acid, Maltodextrin, Fragrance, Isopropyl Alcohol.
